companionAccepted: You wanna go on an adventure with me?#$b#Well, @, what are we waiting for? Let's go!$1
companionAccepted_Spouse: I'd love to, @!$1#$b#Do you want to check out the mines today?
companionRejected: Sounds cool, but I can't go today, sorry.
companionRejectedNight: It's too late to go exploring now!$3
companionRejectedNight_Spouse: Sorry, @, I'm feeling tired. I'll be going to bed soon.
companionDismiss: Thanks for bringing me with you, @, I had fun.$1#$b#I hope to do it again sometime soon, see ya!$1
companionDismiss_Spouse: I had a great time, @, but I should head back to the farm now anyways.#$b#Stay safe, I love you!$1
companionDismissAuto: Hey, @, it's getting late and I'm tired.#$b#I'm gonna go home now, but I had fun! Let's do it again soon.$1
companionDismissAuto_Spouse: I'm gonna go, @.#$b#You should head to bed soon too honey. Be safe!
companionRecruited: Can we go to the mines, @?#$b#I'm always up for that!$1
companionRecruited_Spouse: I'm excited, @! I always love our time together.$4
companionSuggest: Hey, listen! I'm thinking about exploring today.#$q -1 -1#What do you think, @?#$r -1 0 Yes#It's dangerous to go alone! Take me with you.#$r -1 0 No#I would love to go, but my sword is in another bag.
companionSuggest_Yes: Okay, let's go find some trouble!$1
companionSuggest_No: That's no good, @. A real adventurer should always be prepared!
companion_Beach: I see Sebastian out here sometimes when it's raining. He really doesn't like to be bothered on those days, even more than usual.
companion_Beach~1: It's pretty nice here, @.#$b#For a town on the water, this beach doesn't get very busy. I guess we're lucky that way.
companion_Beach_summer: If I knew we were coming here, I would have brought a hat, and applied some sunscreen!$3
companion_Beach_Dating: I like walking along the sea. Don't you just love the sound of it?
companion_Beach_Dating~1: The breeze coming off the water is so nice!#$b#I don't care if it's hot or cold outside, I love that ocean air year round!$1
companion_Beach_Spouse: On a nice day we could come here with a blanket, or even better during the evening, and watch the waves reflect the stars.#$b#Would you like that, @?$4
companion_Desert: Ugh, this heat is killing me!$2#$b#What are we doing here anyways, @?$3
companion_Farm: You're doing a good job on the farm, @. I'm glad you moved here.
companion_Farm_Dating: What's it like to be a farmer, @? It must be nice to have all this land and space to yourself.#$b#I wouldn't mind living on a farm... I've been thinking about that more and more lately.$4
companion_Farm_Spouse: Our farm is never boring, you know? Even so, I think we could change a little something here and there...
companion_Farm_Spouse~1: Do you remember back around when we first met, @? I told you how I used to wander this farm alone, before you got here?#$b#Sometimes, I come out here while you're out running around like crazy.#$b#I stand on the porch and try to remember what it looked like before, all overgrown and wild, I loved it back then...#$b#but, I love it so much more now, because it's where we live. It's our home, and you did that for us. I'm lucky.$4
companion_Forest: Do you think the wizard is here today?#$b#...#$b#Why am I asking? I just think he's an interesting guy.
companion_Forest_summer: I like the sounds of the forest, but the nectar from all these flowers...$2#$b#it's giving me a headache!$3
companion_Forest_Dating: I'm really enjoying this day with, @! I love when we get to spend time together.$1
companion_Forest_Spouse: It really feels magical here, like it's in the air or something. Do you know what I mean, @?
companion_Mine~1: I love this, @! These monsters don't stand a chance!$1
companion_Mine~2: It's so fun to explore these old mines, we can come back here anytime you want!
companion_Mine~3: Have you found anything cool here, @? Keep your eyes open, there's a ton of great stuff!
companion_Mine~4: You know, I'm really glad we're getting closer, @. I think we make a pretty good team!#$b#Super Farmer and Amethyst Girl, dynamic monster slaying duo!$1#$b#Okay, that was pretty lame. Don't tell anybody I said that.$2
companion_Mine_Dating: The monsters here are no joke, @. Stay close to me, I'll protect you!
companion_Mine_Spouse: You know how much I love exploring the mines, @, but I feel much more comfortable when you're here with me.$1
companion_Mine_Spouse~1: Honey, if you see any amethyst, please collect it for me!
companion_Mountain: The wind here is so refreshing!
companion_Mountain_Dating: You're really giving me a workout today, @!#$b#Not that I would ever join my moms aerobics class anyways, but with you, I get all the exercise I need!$1
companion_Mountain_Spouse: I love this part of the valley, and Sebastian lives right over there.#$b#I'm glad he and I are still friends.$1
companion_Town_Dating: You wanna go hang out in my room, @?#$b#Why? To play video games, of course!#$b#What else?$4
companion_Town_Spouse: Hey, @.#$b#Maybe we could go to the saloon together one of these nights, you know, like a date night?#$b#Is that silly, since we're already married?$4
companion_Town_Night: The town is kind of eerie at night, isn't it? I like it.
companion_Town_fall: The leaves are covering the footpaths.#$b#Pelican town is full of so many vibrant colors. It's beautiful!
companion_Town_fall_Rainy: I love when it rains during fall.#$b#It helps me think clearer, and splashing around in puddles is pretty fun!$1
companionReaction_SeedShop.7: Do you want to play Prairie king?#$b#I am ready to beat them!
